cosmos.question: I shine bright in the night sky, and the Moon goes around me. What am I?

hints.text: 🔥 I am very hot!
🌞 I give you light and warmth during the day.
🌎 Planets go around me.

cosmos.question: I am big and round, and you live on me. I have lots of water and land. What am I?

hints.text: 🏡 You have a house here.
🌱 Plants and animals live here too.
🔵 I look blue from space.

cosmos.question: I shine at night, but I don't make my own light. I reflect light from the sun. What am I?

hints.text: 🌕 Sometimes I am round, sometimes I am a crescent.
🧀 Some people think I am made of cheese.
🌎 I go around the Earth.

cosmos.question: I am a bright ball of fire far, far away. I twinkle at night. What am I?

hints.text: 🌟 I am like our Sun, but much further away.
✨ I make my own light.
🌌 There are many of me in the sky.

cosmos.question: I am a group of many stars. I am so big you can barely imagine it! What am I?

hints.text: 💫 I contain billions of stars.
🌀 I can be spiral-shaped or other shapes.
🌌 Earth is part of one.

cosmos.question: I am a cold, rocky body that goes around the sun, but I am smaller than a planet. What am I?

hints.text: ☄️ Some people call me a small planet.
🪐 I am found mostly between Mars and Jupiter.
🪨 I am made of rocks and metal.

cosmos.question: I am a very hot planet closest to the sun.

hints.text: 🌡️ I am named after a Roman God
🔥 I am the smallest planet in the solar system.
☀️ The Sun looks very big from me.

cosmos.question: I am a ball of ice, dust and gas with a tail that sometimes can be seen from Earth.

hints.text: ❄️ I am made of ice, dust, and gas
☄️ I orbit the sun in a long oval path.
🌠 When I get close to the sun, I look like I have a long tail.

cosmos.question: I am known as the 'Red Planet'.

hints.text: 🚀 Humans might live on me one day.
🍫 I am named after the Roman god of war.
🔴 I have a reddish appearance from the iron oxide on my surface.

cosmos.question: I am the biggest planet in our solar system with a giant red spot.

hints.text: 🪐 I have many moons.
💨 I am mostly made of gas.
🔴 My great red spot is a huge storm.

bug.question: I have spots and I can fly. What am I?

hints.text: ⚫ I have lots of dots on my wings.
🍃 I like to land on plants.
🐞 My name sounds a bit like a noble woman.

bug.question: I make honey. Who am I?

hints.text: 🌻 I love to fly around flowers.
🍯 People love to eat what I make.
🐝 I go 'buzz buzz'.

bug.question: I crawl and carry food to my home. What am I?

hints.text: 🐜 I am very small.
💪 I am strong for my size!
🌱 I might take a crumb back to my hill.

bug.question: I jump very high and I'm green. What am I?

hints.text: 🎶 I make chirping sounds.
🌱 I eat grass.
🦗 My name can also describe people from Ireland.

bug.question: I start as a caterpillar and then become something beautiful. What am I?

hints.text: 🦋 I have colorful wings.
🐛 I used to eat leaves.
🌸 I like to fly around flowers.

bug.question: I spin a web to catch my food. Who am I?

hints.text: 🕷️ I have eight legs.
🕸️ My home is sticky.
🪰 Flies can get stuck in my home.

bug.question: I light up the night with my glow. What am I?

hints.text: 🌟 I shine brightly in the dark.
🔦 My light helps me find a friend.
🪲 I am a type of beetle.

bug.question: I make a buzzing noise and sometimes bite you. What am I?

hints.text: 🦟 I can be annoying in the summer.
🩸 I drink blood.
💦 I like to live near water.

bug.question: I have many legs and crawl on the ground, sometimes found under rocks. What am I?

hints.text: 💯 I can have a hundred legs, or almost that many!
🪨 I prefer dark places.
🌿 I eat decaying leaves.

bug.question: I live in a group and build big homes from dirt. Who am I?

hints.text: 🌍 I live in many places, hot and cold.
🧱 My home can be very tall.
🐜 I am a kind of ant.
